title: tobi4255
author: tobi4255
content: WEBSITE|TWITTER|TELEGRAM|DISCORD| LINKEDINCrypto assets comparison platform Cryptoffer invites you to join the COF token presale campaign from October 31 to November 14.During the presale campaign (Private Sale A round: October 31st - November 14th), the Cryptoffer token COF is available to buy for $0.004.Special bonuses for Private sale A round investors:- investment from $500 +5% COF tokens,- investment from $1 000 +10% COF tokens,- investment from $5 000 +20% COF tokens.Join Cryptoffer presale campaign and get your COF tokens on https://cryptoffer.io.After the Cryptoffer platform starts its operations, all COF token holders will receive 20% profit dividends of net fees paid to Cryptoffer by its partners monthly. Cryptoffer is a crypto assets comparison platform to find best crypto deals in one place, in just a few clicks. With Cryptoffer you can compare and choose the best offers for crypto loans, savings, and swapping.Cryptoffer platform benefits for crypto users:Â Time saving â€“ Cryptoffer platform saves users time they would have spent inspecting DeFi lending, saving, and swapping platforms independently to get the best offers for crypto loans, savings, and swapping.Validation of service providers â€“ Cryptoffer platform protects users because it will make efforts to validate saving, lending, and swapping merchants before listing them. This will shield users from widespread crypto frauds and scams.Free of charge service â€“ Cryptoffer platform does not charge any fees for users further because only merchants are charged a commission for successful deals and transactions.Simple and easy to use solution â€“ Cryptoffer platform makes it simple and easy for anyone to engage in crypto activities because everything is built for the user, and they only have to choose the best offer from the available options for their needs.24/7 client support â€“ we offer 24/7 client support, important crypto market information and tips to our users.

comments.author: Blowon
comments.body: you say that you have got $126K in sales, is this personal investor or Vc ? if such a large amount can be ascertained from VC investors, can you announce from anyone who comes to invest for cryptoffer?

comments.author: tobi4255
comments.body: Quote from: Blowon on November 02, 2022, 02:21:19 PMyou say that you have got $126K in sales, is this personal investor or Vc ? if such a large amount can be ascertained from VC investors, can you announce from anyone who comes to invest for cryptoffer?COF presale campaign started from 31st October. Within a day $126k have been raised and so far $182.99K raised

comments.author: blogclaim
comments.body: When Public sale will be started?

comments.author: CCMS
comments.body: Whoa ! $126k funds have been raised ? Not bad at all . What will be the minimum amount one can buy ?

comments.author: tobi4255
comments.body: Quote from: blogclaim on November 02, 2022, 02:56:20 PMWhen Public sale will be started?COF Public sale will start from 12th Dec to 26th DecKeep an aye on our social media for all the updates

comments.author: tobi4255
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on November 02, 2022, 02:58:44 PMWhoa ! $126k funds have been raised ? Not bad at all . What will be the minimum amount one can buy ?Yes, The target for the Private Sale A round is to raise $720 000.$10 is the minimum amount to buy

comments.body: What is the minimum or maximum amount of token that can be purchased?

Within a day $126k have been raised and so far $182.99K raisedlol that's a pretty awesome amount , where do you make sales is it only on the cryptoffer website?and what are your plans for the future after all the token sale plans have been completed?With so many sold, it's certainly not too difficult to develop and do marketing

comments.author: rohan1200
comments.body: I hope you will continue to provide the latest updates on your project. I think this ICO is very nice to participate in here. if you launched a bounty campaign on your project many investors will join in this project. Best of luck.
